title: I logged on and it said I earned a key fragment, but it never gave it to me in loot ;(
body:
I just logged off of league to play some Black Desert Online to take a break and before i logged off i wanted to see how many key frags i had in loot and i only had one... so when i logged on it said congrats and it gave me a single key frag and when i went to go check it in my loot i still only had one... is this a bug or am i just not seeing it?
Any info would be nice thanks!

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and see that you currently have 2 key fragments.  A syncing issue may not have updated your new one.  Relogging should fix that up!
